:py:mod:`utils.dates`
=====================

.. py:module:: utils.dates

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Provides accounting specific date utilities.



Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   utils.dates.get_dates



.. py:function:: get_dates(session, start_date: datetime.datetime = None, end_date: datetime.datetime = None) -> tuple

   Returns the start, end and period start dates given the inputs provided.

   :param start_date: The start date.
   :type start_date: datetime
   :param end_date: The end date.
   :type end_date: datetime
